DOC.brief_summary: Researchers University California San Diego ( UCSD ) conduct 12-week study test PACEPRO program . This program design reduce depression providing : Lexapro , antidepressant medicine…Learn More Physical activity information pedometer Mood management skill Mood Mastery Guide Personalized support Family Nurse Practitioner
DOC.criteria: Have diagnose mild moderate depression Are willing take antidepressant Lexapro Can access use Email Internet Are willing able physically active Access primary care physician Subjects exclude participation follow reason : Pregnancy breastfeed Narrow angle glaucoma Any uncontrolled medical condition medical condition would represent contraindication Escitalopram Oxalate Lexapro® pharmacotherapy . Any concomitant nonpsychotropic medication physician determines contraindication Escitalopram Oxalate Lexapro® pharmacotherapy Bipolar disorder , psychotic organic mental disorder dementia History intolerance allergy Lexapro , prior fail treatment depression Lexapro Current substance abuse dependency Current active suicidal ideation Current use herbal psychoactive treatment St. John 's Wort Concurrent psychotropic medication permit 2 week prior randomization ( 4 week case fluoxetine ) point Receipt formal psychotherapy concurrently Inability , investigator 's opinion , comply study procedures assessment Inability exercise
